entry.title: Sunday: Light snow. Temperature steady near minus 8.

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Light snow ending late this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 26 February 2023
